column3:
ACK 2be35725069fd4c589497b93e09e1c6db6946372 - nice improvement. I checked that with this change ipv6 related tests in `feature_proxy.py` are being run.

> This causes test/functional/rpc_bind.py --ipv6 and test/functional/feature_proxy.py to skip their run.

Note that `rpc_bind.py --ipv6` is still going to be skipped on anything other than Linux due to:

https://github.com/bitcoin/bit
